au_13254: Screen Resolution: xrandr "cannot find mode"

Explanations about Options.--fb:
Reconfigures the screen to the specified size. All configured monitors must fit
 within this size. When this option is not provided, xrandr computes the smallest
 screen size that will hold the set of configured outputs; this option provides a
 way to override that behaviour.
Explanations about Options.--output: Selects an output to reconfigure. Use either the name of the output or the XID.
Explanations about Options.--rate: This sets the refresh rate closest to the specified value.
Explanations about Options.--mode: This selects a mode. Use either the name or the XID for mode
Explanations about Options.--addmode:
output name
 Add a mode to the set of valid modes for an output.
